lead_paragraph: VERDY--Violette. The George Balanchine Foundation mourns the loss of the ebullient ballerina, Violette Verdy. Brilliant on stage; Violette displayed remarkable talent during her performing career. Later, as an inspired teacher and coach, she passed on her profound knowledge of the roles created for her by Mr. Balanchine. The Foundation was fortunate to have captured on film some of her insights, keen intelligence, warmth and delightful personality for its Video Archive Series. Violette will be greatly missed. 1/3
